Name: Synthesis Universe -Episode 00-
About the game: Welcome to Synthesis Universe - Story - An incredible story within a Musical civilization. Every notes, every beat is alive and surrounds you. Episode 00 is about you, who are you in that story: a witness from the future A Music album : each sequence is a story moment, inspired by the structure of the music. Feeling the beat! 7 Music tracks. 4 main sequences + 3 extra. A Hub and a Timeline room (Containing the 3 extra) This is not a game, even if the world is aware of your actions. Expect a unique level of immersion, no menu or text, pure true VR interactions. Take your time! Look around: the world is aware of your actions & will reward you. CAUTION: Built entirely for VR: Standing strongly recommended, 360 necessary sometimes. (Playing seated is possible but not optimal) Can be played just standing up, even with very limited play space! Try to go off bounds! Mostly gaze activated, the motion controllers are not much used in Episode 00 Play time should be about 30 minutes , but time is not limited. Key and button in game: M : Toggle screen mirror mode ON/OFF Pressing Both sticks : Recenter/reorient view. Esc : Quit
